com.facebook.accountkit

Interface AccountPreferences


  • public interface AccountPreferences
    Accesses Account preferences that are stored on the Account Kit servers for the associated app and account. Get an instance of this class through `AccountKit.getAccountPreferences()`

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AccountPreferences.OnDeletePreferenceListener
      Listener for callbacks from `deletePreference` calls.
      static interface  AccountPreferences.OnLoadPreferenceListener
      Listener for callbacks from `loadPreference` calls.
      static interface  AccountPreferences.OnLoadPreferencesListener
      Listener for callbacks from `loadPreferences` calls.
      static interface  AccountPreferences.OnSetPreferenceListener
      Listener for callbacks from `setPreference` calls.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deletePreference(java.lang.String key, AccountPreferences.OnDeletePreferenceListener listener)
      Deletes a single preference.
      void loadPreference(java.lang.String key, AccountPreferences.OnLoadPreferenceListener listener)
      Loads a single preference.
      void loadPreferences(AccountPreferences.OnLoadPreferencesListener listener)
      Loads all preferences.
      void setPreference(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, AccountPreferences.OnSetPreferenceListener listener)
      Writes a single preference.

    • Method Detail

      • deletePreference

        void deletePreference(java.lang.String key,
                    AccountPreferences.OnDeletePreferenceListener listener)
        Deletes a single preference.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the preference
        listener - The listener to be notified when the preference has been deleted

      • loadPreference

        void loadPreference(java.lang.String key,
                  AccountPreferences.OnLoadPreferenceListener listener)
        Loads a single preference.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the preference
        listener - The listener to be notified when the preference has been loaded

      • loadPreferences

        void loadPreferences(AccountPreferences.OnLoadPreferencesListener listener)
        Loads all preferences.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be notified when the preferences have been loaded

      • setPreference

        void setPreference(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 AccountPreferences.OnSetPreferenceListener listener)
        Writes a single preference.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the preference - must be ASCII letters, digits or the underscore character and be 1-100 characters in length
        value - The value for the preference - must be 1-1000 characters in length
        listener - The listener to be notified when the preference has been set
